intro.title: HEY, I'M WENDY TSAI
intro.subTitle: A Frontend Developer building the Frontend of Websites and Web Applications with Vue and React
about.title: about me
about.subTitle: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills mostly in terms of programming and technology
about.content1: I'm a Frontend Web Developer who loves programming and has proficiency in Chinese, English, and Thai.I have a wide range of interests and enjoy trying new things. I have learned video editing, Illustrator, Photoshop, and several musical instruments by myself.
about.content2: I'm self-taught and believe that an excellent engineer should have a spirit of continuous learning and be able to apply what they have learned in practice, as well as have good observation skills in order to create user-friendly products.
skills.title: My Skills
projects.subTitle: Here you will find some personal and clients project that I participate in and feel free to view more about the detail
projects.gameCenterDesc: A platform that gathers all the games, I'm in charge of login, registration, betting records, game production, about us, frequently asked questions, etc.
projects.otherGamesDesc: These are the games included in the Game Center, with details of various game itmes such as lottery, blockchain, and exchange
projects.backstageDesc: Games, user account management, using a large number of form to manage platform data and dashboard
contact.subTitle: Feel free to contact me by calling or via email and I will get back to you as soon as possible
projects.wiselletDesc: An app made for mainly foreign workers which allows them to top up the money and simply purchase stuffs with their phone. This project is implemented with React Native
projects.2esimDesc: It is a website that sells Esim and it's currently official. I've implemented the cart and have the experience of integrate api with third-party payment with backend engineer also implemented admin dashboard
